title: Building the conda envirorment fails on Ubuntu 20.04
body:
There seems to be an issue with the gui installation for DLC. The DLC yaml scripts will fail unless installing without the gui with the following errors: 


```
T    Checking for /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/bin/waf-2.0.8...
    "/home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python" /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/bin/waf-2.0.8 --wx_config=/tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/build/wxbld/gtk3/wx-config --gtk3 --python="/home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python" --out=build/waf/3.7/gtk3 configure build
    Setting top to                           : /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b
    Setting out to                           : /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/build/waf/3.7/gtk3
    Checking for 'gcc' (C compiler)          : /usr/bin/gcc
    Checking for 'g++' (C++ compiler)        : /usr/bin/g++
    Checking for program 'python'            : /home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python
    Checking for python version >= 2.7.0     : 3.7.10
    python-config                            : /home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python3.7-config
    Asking python-config for pyext '--cflags --libs --ldflags' flags : yes
    Testing pyext configuration                                      : Could not build python extensions
    The configuration failed
    (complete log in /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/build/waf/3.7/gtk3/config.log)
    Command '"/home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python" /tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/bin/waf-2.0.8 --wx_config=/tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/build/wxbld/gtk3/wx-config --gtk3 --python="/home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python" --out=build/waf/3.7/gtk3 configure build ' failed with exit code 1.
    Finished command: build_py (0.748s)
    Finished command: build (0m1.547s)
    Command '"/home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python" -u build.py build' failed with exit code 1.
    ----------------------------------------
ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: /home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/bin/python -u -c 'import io, os, sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-efw8ji3l/wxpython_4e73fc081bf9491887385288ce8aa53b/setup.py'"'"';f = getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__) if os.path.exists(__file__) else io.StringIO('"'"'from setuptools import setup; setup()'"'"');code = f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' install --record /tmp/pip-record-qo8ceg0i/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile --install-headers /home/georgeadmin@dc.cube.local/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/include/python3.7m/wxpython Check the logs for full command output.

```

This is with the latest Anaconda install for Linux.
